body.name: Dexiang Reed Diffuser Set, 3.35 Ounces (120ml) is a Great Gifts、Home Essentials for New Home，Bathroom Decor。 (Lavender and Sandalwood)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 1 hr 34 mins
features: White tea: With the addition of lime, white tea, and a stunning aroma of musk. Add a touch of red maple leaves to the transparent bottle to bring it to life

Aromatic reed diffuser: includes (1) 5 rattan oil diffusion rods, (2) an elegant and transparent large glass bottle, a unique milky white lid (3) high-quality natural mixed essential oils (100 milliliters, 3.5 ounces (approximately 330 grams)), suitable for 60 days of continuous fragrance.

A thoughtful gift for women and men - a gift that everyone can enjoy. Great gift for new homeowners or housewarming gift registries. An impressive gift for a colleague, boss, employee or office employee.

Convenient odor control and lasting fragrance - you can add or remove the number of reed according to your preference. It takes 1-2 days to soak the fabric stick in the fragrance. When the fragrance becomes weak, just invert the reed stick or replace it with a new reed.
The use of genuine dried flowers is to avoid perfunctory details in daily life and make users feel the sweetness of life
body.description: Lavender and Sandalwood HOW TO USE On the first use, soak the cotton sticks in the bottle and flip them overFlip the sticks once a week for the first two weeks of use and then every four days until the fragrance evaporatesThe sticks absorb the fragrance and subtly distribute it, providing lasting scent, up to 70 days.Duration of the perfume may vary depending on the room's size, temperature, the reed diffuser's exposure to direct sunlight, and draughts, which can increase the rate of evaporation of the perfume Top note: lavender Middle note: male clove Base note: amber

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The initial experience brought by DEXIANG Relax and have a good rest! We believe that putting ourselves first is the most important thing, ensuring that you have what you need to do, which inspires everything we do. We insist on using plant extracts to give you that fleeting initial experience. Lavender and Sandalwood HOW TO USE On the first use, soak the cotton sticks in the bottle and flip them overFlip the sticks once a week for the first two weeks of use and then every four days until the fragrance evaporatesThe sticks absorb the fragrance and subtly distribute it, providing lasting scent, up to 70 days.Duration of the perfume may vary depending on the room's size, temperature, the reed diffuser's exposure to direct sunlight, and draughts, which can increase the rate of evaporation of the perfume Top note: lavender Middle note: male clove Base note: amber

RELAXING SCENTS Breathe in and embrace the delightful aromaof the fragrance from the reed diffuser as itfills the space Using real plants We strictly select plants to enhance the beauty of our products and enhance the familiarity of gift giving Material selection The selection of materials is extremely strictand only precious natural raw materials can beused with confidence DECOR FOR YOUR HOME & OFFICE Enhance any table, shelf, or counter with thisclassy reed diffuser.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells really good!
reviews.reviewText: I have it on a shelf in my living room (which is pretty spacious) and you can smell it the minute you walk into the room! It's also a cute decoration, it looks nice on my shelf with all my other decorations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells absolutely amazing!
reviews.reviewText: Not only does it smells amazing, it's beautiful as well. I bought this for my guest room and so far everyone that has stayed has commented on how great it smells in the room. It's been in the room for about a month and still smells like the 1st day I opened it. I will definitely buy more of these for other rooms in the house.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very weak smell, but looks cool but a little cheap at the same time
reviews.reviewText: I have this item in a really small bathroom and you still can barely smell it. I even added extra reeds and it still doesn’t smell. It only smells if you put your nose directly next to it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lovely scents and wish it came with more fragrance oil
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the Shangri La (smells like an amber musk) and Lavender. These are beautiful diffusers - aesthetically appealing - and smell strong when using all diffuser reeds.My biggest con with these diffusers is that neither of them arrived full (not anywhere close to the 100 ml capacity as advertised by the photos). I also noticed this with other reviewer pics but no one has commented on that.I understand this is a fragrance oil and, even with the best intentions and wrapping (which was great), spills may happen. In fact, my Lavender one arrived with such an ordeal, and I was too excited to start using these gorgeous diffusers that I didn’t pause to take pictures of the inner package that had wet staining. The Shangri La one fared better in transit and didn’t lose any oil. The inner packaging was completely dry.That said, they were both delivered 8/14 and it is now 8/21 (7 days later). Look at the pics. To have such little oil already after one week is not worth it to me, personally, for the price I paid. Perhaps it would be if they arrived nearly full in the first place, but they don’t.I wish the company would sell these fragrant oils in separate, airtight bottles so that customers can keep these lovely bottles and refill them when they’re nearly empty. I also wish they would fill their bottles so that customers receive what they pay for (what they see in the advertised photos of a full bottle of 100 ml of fragrance oil).Hope this review helps others!UPDATE: Added 2 stars back to my review because seller reached out to me with a full refund for the diffusers. Excellent customer service! Also, I bought separate fragrance oil from Walmart and refilled these bottles because they’re too nice to throw away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was so excited to get this diffuser! But I can’t smell anything unless I get up close…but what is the point of that :( maybe it needs more time. We shall see

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells so good
reviews.reviewText: This thing smells so good I ordered another one for my other bathroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells lovely. One stick is enough for a bathroom
reviews.reviewText: My husband and I usually kept our bathroom closed because we have naughty cats, but it is very very strong in a small room
